thread.title: 2nd ODI: India opt to bat against SA after winning toss, make 3 changes
thread.title_full: 2nd ODI: India opt to bat against SA after winning toss, make 3 changes - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 2nd ODI: India opt to bat against SA after winning toss, make 3 changes
text:
*Indore*: India captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni decided to bat first after winning the toss as the home team made three changes to their playing XI in the second One Day International cricket match, here today.
From the last match, Ravi Ashwin is out due to injury while Stuart Binny and Amit Mishra have been dropped from the ... Â»
